attributes.action: Stop Welsh Water building a super water treatment plant at Pontsarn.
attributes.additional_details: Building at this location will have a masive environmental and potential tourist impact on a already over burdened area. Recovering from the mess that the steel and coal industry left and currently having to deal with road building, open cast mining and landfill, all within a 1 mile radius.
attributes.background: Stop Dwr Cymru from building a new water treatment plant on a green field site at Pontsarn.

rejection.details:
This is a planning matter for Merthyr Tydfil County Borough Council (MTCBC), not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also start a petition on the MTCBC website calling for planning permission for this scheme to be revoked, if that is something you'd like to see happen. You can find out how to do this here: https://www.merthyr.gov.uk/council/have-your-say/petitions/
